mdRecord.dcterms:title: Sowers Cemetery, Alum Ridge
mdRecord.dcterms:description:
This cemetery sits adjacent to 1702 Beaver Creek Rd. NW. It is beautifully maintained, fenced on three side s and open to the road making for easy access. It is visible from Google earth and Google Maps.
N 36 56.789' W 80 24.454'
